title: Permabanned for talking shit with friends.
body:
So basically, im playing a nice lil game of league with all my friends.I shit talk them for fun and all of us knowing we are just joking. I lose but get a great score and show no toxicity towards the other team.

I get permabanned the next second for talking with my friends and roasting each other for the fun of it.

I don't know how this could possibly happen.

What do y'all think?
Deserved or non-deserved?
